messages.message:
hey guys - working on some vendor onboarding paper. who can point me to some documentation that can help respond to this prompt:

“*Capability of product to encrypt or decrypt data, text, files, passwords, PINs, etc”*
cc @Hari this is a great question for the <#C0119EXLXGU|>
@zach.steele just to be clear are we talking about processing encrypted files like PDFs, xlsx, docx etc?

I think they're wondering about processing not just encrypted files but what else in the platform we encrypt & how :man-shrugging:

Are there docs or a white paper to this effect?
Including like, passwords of the devs who will be building in instabase
cc: @Heymian to help with data storage encryption!

mm this is a bit of a vague question, this doesn’t seem like they’re asking about encryption for data at rest at the storage layer, or about secrets required at the deployment level, this is more about encryption for data processing right?
